title: Bangladesh Blocks Roads, Internet; Army Deployed To Curb Protests
content: Bangladesh soldiers patrolled the deserted streets of the capital Dhaka on Saturday and set up roadblocks during a curfew meant to quell deadly students-led protests against government job quotas that have killed at least 110 people this week.
summary: Bangladesh soldiers patrolled the deserted streets of the capital Dhaka on Saturday and set up roadblocks during a curfew meant to quell deadly students-led protests against government job quotas that have killed at least 110 people this week.

title: US Billionaire Buys Dinosaur Skeleton For $45 Million, Sets Auction Records
content: The towering, 11-foot-high behemoth, dubbed "Apex," was excavated just outside present-day Dinosaur, Colorado, in May 2022.
summary: The towering, 11-foot-high behemoth, dubbed "Apex," was excavated just outside present-day Dinosaur, Colorado, in May 2022.

title: Donald Trump To Hold First Campaign Rally After Assassination Attempt
content: Donald Trump will hold his first campaign rally on Saturday since he narrowly escaped an assassination attempt one week ago and fresh from his nominating convention where his takeover of the Republican Party was cemented.
summary: Donald Trump will hold his first campaign rally on Saturday since he narrowly escaped an assassination attempt one week ago and fresh from his nominating convention where his takeover of the Republican Party was cemented.

title: All About Boeing's 777X, The Biggest Dual-Engine Commercial Plane In World
content: The 777X, Boeing's latest incarnation of the popular 777 family, has received more than 500 orders, although it has not yet entered commercial service.
summary: The 777X, Boeing's latest incarnation of the popular 777 family, has received more than 500 orders, although it has not yet entered commercial service.

title: July's Full Buck Moon Rises On July 21: All You Need To Know
content: This Buck Moon coincides with the 55th anniversary of the 1969 Apollo moon landing
summary: This Buck Moon coincides with the 55th anniversary of the 1969 Apollo moon landing

title: "Playing With Fire": China Warns Europe Over "Meddling" In Taiwan
content: China has slammed the European Commission over their stand on Taiwan, terming it "gross interference" in the country's internal affairs, Taiwan News reported.
summary: China has slammed the European Commission over their stand on Taiwan, terming it "gross interference" in the country's internal affairs, Taiwan News reported.

title: Centre To Play Key Role In Shaping 6G Networks Worldwide: Telecom Secretary
content: Centre will play a crucial role in shaping standards and infrastructure for 6G networks worldwide, Dr Neeraj Mittal, Secretary (Telecom), has said.
summary: Centre will play a crucial role in shaping standards and infrastructure for 6G networks worldwide, Dr Neeraj Mittal, Secretary (Telecom), has said.

title: Justin Trudeau Appoints Steven Mackinnon As New Labour Minister
content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Friday appointed Steven MacKinnon, a Liberal member of parliament from Quebec, as the new labor minister, filling a vacancy created when Seamus O'Regan stepped down for personal reasons.
summary: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Friday appointed Steven MacKinnon, a Liberal member of parliament from Quebec, as the new labor minister, filling a vacancy created when Seamus O'Regan stepped down for personal reasons.

title: US Issues Warning On Microsoft Outage, Satya Nadella Says "Working"
content: US cybersecurity agency CISA has issued a warning that hackers are trying to take advantage of Microsoft outage for phishing and other malicious activity.
summary: US cybersecurity agency CISA has issued a warning that hackers are trying to take advantage of Microsoft outage for phishing and other malicious activity.

title: The 'Fake' CrowdStrike Worker Who Took Credit For Biggest-Ever IT Outage
content: Microsoft outage: Vincent Flibustier broke the internet with an altered, AI-generated photo of him outside the CrowdStrike office along with the caption, "First day at Crowdstrike, pushed a little update and taking the afternoon off."
summary: Microsoft outage: Vincent Flibustier broke the internet with an altered, AI-generated photo of him outside the CrowdStrike office along with the caption, "First day at Crowdstrike, pushed a little update and taking the afternoon off."

title: Trump Rally Shooter Flew Drone Over Event Site Hours Before Attack: Report
content: The shooter who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally flew a drone over the event site hours before the attack, law enforcement officials said.
summary: The shooter who attempted to assassinate Donald Trump at a Pennsylvania rally flew a drone over the event site hours before the attack, law enforcement officials said.

title: CrowdStrike: All About The Cybersecurity Giant Behind Global IT Outage
content: CrowdStrike, the cybersecurity company behind a massive global IT outage, is a leader in its sector, known for building software defenses for the cloud computing age and exposing Russian and North Korean threats.
summary: CrowdStrike, the cybersecurity company behind a massive global IT outage, is a leader in its sector, known for building software defenses for the cloud computing age and exposing Russian and North Korean threats.

title: At Least 12 Killed After Bridge Collapses In China Due To Torrential Rains
content: 12 people were killed when a bridge in northern China collapsed amid torrential rains, state news agency Xinhua reported Saturday.
summary: 12 people were killed when a bridge in northern China collapsed amid torrential rains, state news agency Xinhua reported Saturday.

title: CrowdStrike Crash Raises Questions About Technological Dependency
content: Catastrophic computer outages caused by a software update from one company have once again exposed the dangers of global technological dependence on a handful of players, experts warned on Friday.
summary: Catastrophic computer outages caused by a software update from one company have once again exposed the dangers of global technological dependence on a handful of players, experts warned on Friday.

title: Full Recovery From Global IT Outage Could Take Time: 10 Points
content: Businesses and services around the world are slowly recovering after a massive IT outage affected computer systems worldwide on Friday. Experts, however, said full recovery from the huge crash would take "some time."
summary: Businesses and services around the world are slowly recovering after a massive IT outage affected computer systems worldwide on Friday. Experts, however, said full recovery from the huge crash would take "some time."

title: Microsoft Cloud Outage LIVE: Stock Exchanges Unaffected By Global Outage
content: Airline systems across airports, which were impacted due to a global IT outage on Friday, have started working normally, and all issues are likely to be resolved by noon today, Civil Aviation Minister K Rammohan Naidu said.
summary: Airline systems across airports, which were impacted due to a global IT outage on Friday, have started working normally, and all issues are likely to be resolved by noon today, Civil Aviation Minister K Rammohan Naidu said.

title: "Stakes Are High, Choice Is Clear": Biden Vows To Stay In Presidential Race
content: US President Joe Biden pledged to stay in the White House race Friday, defying a growing Democratic party revolt that raised speculation he could bow out as soon as this weekend.
summary: US President Joe Biden pledged to stay in the White House race Friday, defying a growing Democratic party revolt that raised speculation he could bow out as soon as this weekend.

title: Meta Content Moderation Vendors Hit By Global Cyber Outage
content: Some external vendors that police content on Facebook owner Meta's platforms were affected by the global tech outage that crippled airports, banks and hospitals on Friday, a Meta spokesperson said in response to a Reuters query.
summary: Some external vendors that police content on Facebook owner Meta's platforms were affected by the global tech outage that crippled airports, banks and hospitals on Friday, a Meta spokesperson said in response to a Reuters query.

title: Conspiracy Theories Take Off After Global IT Crash
content: From fearmongering about a looming "World War III" to false narratives linking a cabal of global elite to a cyberattack, a torrent of online conspiracy theories took off Friday after a major IT crash.
summary: From fearmongering about a looming "World War III" to false narratives linking a cabal of global elite to a cyberattack, a torrent of online conspiracy theories took off Friday after a major IT crash.

title: Trump Says Spoke With Zelensky, Pledges To "End The War"
content: US Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said Friday he had spoken by telephone with Ukraine leader Volodymyr Zelensky, and pledged to end the European country's war with Russia.
summary: US Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said Friday he had spoken by telephone with Ukraine leader Volodymyr Zelensky, and pledged to end the European country's war with Russia.
